description: half length portrait of the artist after a self portrait painted in 1699; turned right and looking back at viewer; wearing curly wig, cloak and open neck shirt; paper in PL hand and brush in PR hand
inscription:
Inscription. Signature, and Title
 
in image in black: Joseph Vivien natus ..... (15 lines of biographical information in Latin) | on verso in pencil: Joseph Vivien / a bold line all around / & make even at the bottom / 2-567
signed:
See Inscription

in image lower corners: CCW in    CIV F    7
title: Portrait of Joseph Vivien
